site_name: Swan Annexe 219 - 221 High StreetEnfieldEN3 4DX
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details submitted pursuant to reference 23/00875/RE4: acoustic report (4) in respect of replacement of existing timber framed single glazed windows on the west elevation (facing High Street) with new timber framed double glazed windows, replacement of windows on all other elevations with new aluminium framed double glazed windows, removal and replacement of roof top plant, new electrical intake enclosure, together with replacement of the existing external escape staircase with a new staircase and accessibility ramp to side elevation.
